data.sentence: The word ذَاتِ comes from the root ذ و and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to intend, support, place columns or pillars, place lofty structure, prop up, resolve, aim, direct, propose, commit (a sin intentionally), lofty structure, tent, pole, base, chief.
data.sentence: The word الْعِمَادِ comes from the root ع م د and is associated with the meanings: to intend, support, place columns or pillars, place lofty structure, prop up, resolve, aim, direct, propose, commit (a sin intentionally), lofty structure, tent, pole, base, chief.
